solution_line_template: Susan's time was {jen_time} seconds + {susan_longer_than_jen} seconds = <<{jen_time}+{susan_longer_than_jen}={susan_time}>>{susan_time} seconds.
Tiffany's time was {mary_time} seconds - {tiffany_less_than_mary} seconds = <<{mary_time}-{tiffany_less_than_mary}={tiffany_time}>>{tiffany_time} seconds.

The total time for the team was {mary_time} seconds + {susan_time} seconds + {jen_time} seconds + {tiffany_time} seconds = <<{mary_time}+{susan_time}+{jen_time}+{tiffany_time}={total_team_time}>>{total_team_time} seconds.
